news.title: Apple Kicks Off Black Friday: The New Mac Mini M4 Is on Sale For The First Time Ever
news.description: The new Mac Mini M4 is discounted on Amazon with an instant discount and a $25 coupon.
news.api_content: Apple’s latest Mac Mini M4 has just hit the market and it’s already on sale just ahead of Black Friday. Originally priced at $599, the new Mac Mini M4 256GB is now available for $549 (10% off). The d… [+1641 chars]
news.summary:
Apple’s latest Mac Mini M4 has just hit the market and it’s already on sale just ahead of Black Friday.
Originally priced at $599, the new Mac Mini M4 256GB is now available for $549 (10% off).
The deal combines a direct $25 discount with an additional $25 coupon on Amazon.
See at AmazonThe Mac Mini M4 is not just another desktop; it’s one of the most powerful desktop computers you can have.
This user-friendly design is complemented by the robust performance capabilities that the M4 chip brings to the table (see our latest Mac Mini M4 review here).
news.text_preview:
Apple’s latest Mac Mini M4 has just hit the market and it’s already on sale just ahead of Black Friday. Originally priced at $599, the new Mac Mini M4 256GB is now available for $549 (10% off). The deal combines a direct $25 discount with an additional $25 coupon on Amazon.

See at Amazon

The Mac Mini M4 is not just another desktop; it’s one of the most powerful desktop computers you can have. It measures only 5 inches square and it’s designed to fit seamlessly into any workspace without sacrificing power. The heart of this machine is the advanced M4 chip which enhances productivity across a variety of tasks, from everyday computing to more intensive applications. With 16GB of unified memory and 256GB of SSD storage, this base model is well-equipped to handle most users’ needs.

New Design, More Performance

As you’ve probably noticed, the new Mac Mini has a redesigned chassis, and Apple has also included front-facing ports alongside the traditional rear connections to improve accessi...
news.short_summary:
Apple’s latest Mac Mini M4 has just hit the market and it’s already on sale just ahead of Black Friday.
Originally priced at $599, the new Mac Mini M4 256GB is now available for $549 (10% off).
The deal combines a direct $25 discount with an additional $25 coupon on Amazon.
See at AmazonThe Mac Mini M4 is not just another desktop; it’s one of the most powerful desktop computers you can have.
This user-friendly design is complemented by the robust performance capabilities that the M4 chip brings to the table (see our latest Mac Mini M4 review here)..

news.title: Samsung Clears Galaxy Z Fold 6 Stock, Price Drops to $499 from $1,899 Before Black Friday
news.description: Black Friday is now live at Samsung, and the deal on the Galaxy Z Fold 6 is absolutely mind-blowing.
news.api_content: Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6. The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents s… [+2875 chars]
news.summary:
Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents substantial savings across all storage variants of the Z Fold 6.
The deal kicks off with an instant $700 discount on all storage configurations of the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
Best Deal Ever SeenThe Galaxy Z Fold 6 itself is a marvel of modern smartphone technology and show Samsung capacity of innovation.
Ultimately, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 is running on Android 14 (with Samsung’s One UI) and offers a refined user experience tailored for its unique form factor.
news.text_preview:
Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6. The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents substantial savings across all storage variants of the Z Fold 6.

The deal kicks off with an instant $700 discount on all storage configurations of the Galaxy Z Fold 6. This means the 256GB model, originally priced at $1,899, now starts at just $1,199. The same $700 reduction applies to the 512GB and 1TB versions which brings their prices down significantly as well. This alone is a great offer- considering the device’s high-end specifications and innovative design.

See at Samsung.com

However, the savings don’t stop there. Samsung is sweetening the deal even further with an enhanced trade-in program: Customers can receive up to $1,200 off the original price when they trade in an eligible device. This trade-in offer is stackable with a $200 immediate discount and reduces the price of the 256...
news.short_summary:
Samsung has unleashed a great early Black Friday deal on its flagship foldable smartphone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
The huge discount is available exclusively on Samsung’s official website and presents substantial savings across all storage variants of the Z Fold 6.
The deal kicks off with an instant $700 discount on all storage configurations of the Galaxy Z Fold 6.
Best Deal Ever SeenThe Galaxy Z Fold 6 itself is a marvel of modern smartphone technology and show Samsung capacity of innovation.
Ultimately, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 is running on Android 14 (with Samsung’s One UI) and offers a refined user experience tailored for its unique form factor..

news.title: What could Trump do to lower grocery prices? Experts weigh in
news.description: Food prices have climbed more than 25% since President Joe Biden took office.
news.api_content: President-elect Donald Trump sharply criticized the rising price of groceries throughout his campaign, even delivering an address outside his New Jersey home in August alongside a table covered with … [+6102 chars]
news.summary:
What could Trump do to lower grocery prices?
Still, the yearslong bout of rapid inflation has sent food prices soaring more than 25% since President Joe Biden took office.
Still, Trump could enact policies that may slow the rise of grocery prices, or even lower the cost of some household staples, economists added.
"We can't simply look at the benefits," Cabral said, acknowledging the potential for lower food prices.
Andolfatto, of the University of Miami, said a price-gouging ban could lower food prices if it barred rapid price increases under some circumstances.
news.text_preview:
Food prices have climbed more than 25% since President Joe Biden took office.

What could Trump do to lower grocery prices? Experts weigh in

President-elect Donald Trump sharply criticized the rising price of groceries throughout his campaign, even delivering an address outside his New Jersey home in August alongside a table covered with cereal boxes, coffee grounds and ketchup.

A wave of consumer discontent appears to have helped lift him back into the Oval Office, but Trump now faces the task of how to ease voters' frustration.

Food inflation soared to a peak of more than 10% in 2022, but price increases have slowed to about 2%, U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics data shows.

Still, the yearslong bout of rapid inflation has sent food prices soaring more than 25% since President Joe Biden took office.

Typically, prices do not fall across the board unless the economy slows or even tips into recession, which would reduce consumer demand but also impose economic hardship, some economist...
news.short_summary:
What could Trump do to lower grocery prices?
Still, the yearslong bout of rapid inflation has sent food prices soaring more than 25% since President Joe Biden took office.
Still, Trump could enact policies that may slow the rise of grocery prices, or even lower the cost of some household staples, economists added.
"We can't simply look at the benefits," Cabral said, acknowledging the potential for lower food prices.
Andolfatto, of the University of Miami, said a price-gouging ban could lower food prices if it barred rapid price increases under some circumstances..

news.title: I bought an Apple Watch Series 10, and I’m surprised by how much I love it
news.description: Apple has struck a perfect blend of small improvements in the Apple Watch while preserving everything that makes its wearable feel comfortable and familiar.
news.api_content: There’s little doubt that the Apple Watch has become one of the most popular wearables. While it wasn’t the first smartwatch on the market by a long shot, Apple’s wearable seemed to find its stride m… [+12952 chars]
news.summary:
There are key milestones in Apple Watch updatesApple doesn’t typically do much with the processors in the Apple Watch.
In 2018, the Apple Watch Series 4 made a massive leap to a 64-bit processor, which was repackaged in the Series 5.
Why I upgraded to the Apple Watch Series 10With that already on my mind, the Apple Watch Series 10 added just enough to make me seriously consider it.
It’s a testament to how similar the Apple Watch Series 8 and Series 10 look that she didn’t even notice that I was wearing a new Apple Watch until after I surprised her with her birthday gift and pointed mine out.
As long as you have one of the new USB-C Apple Watch charging pucks or a 5W stand or dock made for the Series 7 or later, the Apple Watch Series 10 will get maximum charging speeds.
news.text_preview:
There’s little doubt that the Apple Watch has become one of the most popular wearables. While it wasn’t the first smartwatch on the market by a long shot, Apple’s wearable seemed to find its stride more quickly than many of its rivals.

That’s not to say that the competition isn’t heating up. This year’s Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 and Galaxy Watch Ultra are worthy contenders thanks to improved performance and new health features. Nevertheless, the Apple Watch has had a cozy lead, erven though it sometimes feels like Apple is coasting by adding only iterative improvements each year.

Recommended Videos

A little over two years ago, I was still comfortably wearing an Apple Watch Series 5. As I wrote at the time, the Apple Watch Series 8, while interesting, wasn’t a compelling enough upgrade on its own. I did eventually make the leap, but only because I wanted to hand my Series 5 down to my Dad. However, when I strapped on the Apple Watch Series 8, I frequently had to remind myself it was a n...
news.short_summary:
There are key milestones in Apple Watch updatesApple doesn’t typically do much with the processors in the Apple Watch.
In 2018, the Apple Watch Series 4 made a massive leap to a 64-bit processor, which was repackaged in the Series 5.
Why I upgraded to the Apple Watch Series 10With that already on my mind, the Apple Watch Series 10 added just enough to make me seriously consider it.
It’s a testament to how similar the Apple Watch Series 8 and Series 10 look that she didn’t even notice that I was wearing a new Apple Watch until after I surprised her with her birthday gift and pointed mine out.
As long as you have one of the new USB-C Apple Watch charging pucks or a 5W stand or dock made for the Series 7 or later, the Apple Watch Series 10 will get maximum charging speeds..
